By Froze03 on Wednesday, February 11, 2009 - 07:53 pm:

I finish the game, but i dunno how to get a gali??

By GM on Thursday, February 12, 2009 - 10:37 am:

After you beat the official S tournament, you'll be eligible to compete in four big tournaments which will grant you authorization to raise Naga, Monol, Gali and Centaur. Gali's tournament is on the first week of December

By Froze03 on Thursday, February 12, 2009 - 05:08 pm:

Hmmm!? i don't still get it,, So after the gali's tournament that will be held on first week of december? So after i beat gali what will happen? Can i get something from the that tournament?
Plzz help me Sir

Im a filipino fan of monster rancher since grade school.. ^^

By GM on Thursday, February 12, 2009 - 05:39 pm:

If you win the tournament, you'll get the Gali Mask. Use the mask in combination to get Gali.

Wow, I've certainly neglected the locked monsters thread in the FAQ. I should give it a once over once I've gotten more university work out of the way.

By Thorr on Saturday, February 14, 2009 - 07:14 am:

The calendar of tournaments can be found elsewhere in this section. Check the Unlock thread. :)

By Thorr on Saturday, February 14, 2009 - 07:16 am:

Here, i will quote my own message...

"Ok, since the Big 4 appears to be the way to get 4 of the last 6 breeds, I will list the big 4 and what breeds come from them.

1) 3/1 - Monol
2) 6/1 - Centaur
3) 9/1 - Naga
4) 12/1 - Gali
"

By OgreBattle on Thursday, April 16, 2009 - 10:19 am:

I did the tournament to unlock a gali, got the mask, but when I try to combine my plant/joker and pure hengar the mask does not show up. Any help please?

By Thorr on Friday, April 17, 2009 - 07:27 pm:

I wouldn't bother. You'd be better off generating one from the shrine. COmbining two monsters with the Item will only get you a baseline Gali anyway. You should save your combination for a better monster. There should be a Gali code in the database somewhere. If you unlocked Gali, then use that instead.

By OgreBattle on Saturday, April 18, 2009 - 08:23 am:

Well actually you don't have a code to generate one. Frankly, you dont have many codes at all.

By Thorr on Saturday, April 18, 2009 - 09:15 am:

Well, it's hard to post Japanese codes on a board that doesn't support the Japanese language. I'll get one in a sec and post it.

By Thorr on Saturday, April 18, 2009 - 09:28 am:

Oh yeah, the Perfect Guide doesn't give any actual codes, but it does say that the only way to regen a Gali is to use a written code of 5-6 characters.
